## POLLENStakeChange type

Represents the change between two states of an POLLEN Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type POLLENStakeChange<T> = {
    stakePOLLEN: T;
    unstakePOLLEN?: undefined;
} | {
    stakePOLLEN?: undefined;
    unstakePOLLEN: T;
    unstakeAllPOLLEN: boolean;
};
```
